binding.p: Leather cover, with title on the spine("VIKRAMARKEN KADAI TAMOUL") and heraldic lilies on the spine.

origin.origDate: 1729 at the latest. The stamp “BIBLIOTHEQUE ROYALE” indicates that the codex is an old acquisition. It appears to be the paper Vicramarquen Cadey or Vicramarken Kadey sent by the Pondichéry Missionnaries in 1729, according to lists found in the “Anciens catalogues de la Bibliothèque du Roi … Mémoires de livres et mss. envoyés par les Jésuites de l’Inde pour la Bibliothèque du Roi, en 1729-1735” (BnF NAF 5442). 1750 according to Cabaton (1912, p. 60).
